title: Can't comment or post
body: trying to post in team recruitment but can't  do till I'm level 6? Does this go by summoner level in game? If so, I'm lvl 30 @ Gold 5. Looking forward to your response.

replies.body: Your account may need to sync to the boards when first posting.  Everything looks okay now!  Let me know if you have any issues posting!
Why does it sync only on posting? Why not on a more intuitive action like login or consulting profile page?

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ImUINLiH,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-21T20:55:09.138+0000)
>
> Your account may need to sync to the boards when first posting.  Everything looks okay now!  Let me know if you have any issues posting!

Thank you very much for the quick response.
